General.Name: One World Lithium Inc
General.Description: One World Lithium Inc. focuses on the acquisition, exploration, and development of lithium-brine properties and extraction technology in Mexico. The company was formerly known as One World Minerals Inc. and changed its name to One World Lithium Inc. in January 2018. One World Lithium Inc. was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 800 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2V6
